system.description: As precise and accurate as a well-crafted arrow, archers don't mess around. They prefer to keep their distance, as that is where they are the most effective, never letting anyone get too close to them. Archers are direct and focused and thus make the best guards. Ever vigilant, archers are always looking ahead as, if taken by surprise, they are easily killed. If you are playing an Archer be direct, and on target, sturdy and perhaps high strung, watchful of the future and of your back.

overview.base: You aim your weapon with deadly precision, causing the next attack you make to be boosted. This attack must hit the target's vitals (AC + 3).

system.requirements: You must remain stationary until you make the boosted attack.

overview.base: When you attack with a ranged weapons, you may attack up to 2 additional targets as well. You must have enough ammunition or thrown weapons to make these additional attacks. These all count as the same attack, although you roll for the attacks against each target separately. They do not incur additional attack penalties.
You gain Bow Blocking and Free Reload.
Bows you use have their BV increased by 2.

system.requirements: Target has the loading property.

overview.base: During a short rest, you may scavenge materials and make 1 bow a set of 5 arrows (these count as "1 item" for the purpose of Improvised Items), general supplies. Only common mundane items can typically be made in this way, but the GM may specify if other options are available to you. These items exist for 8 hours before they are no longer functional.
overview.proficient: You can instead make up to P weapons.
overview.fluent: You can instead make up to F weapons.
